MongoDB

25 Mar 2014

tutorial

MongoDB教程

The Little MongoDB Book

drop collection:

db.collection.drop()

delete property, $unset prop to '', and the third param apply to all:

db.collection.update({prop_a: true}, {$unset: {prop_b: ''} }, true)

start

start server:

mongod --config /usr/local/etc/mongod.conf

start shell:

mongo
